member.name: T:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode
member.summary: Encapsulates information about a labeled spatial anchored element.
member.remarks: This type if the 'glue' between spatial anchors (which have no meaning attached to them) and App Holograms. SpatialEntity are designed to work as 'spatial labels' in the world. Proximity can be used to discover content attached to SpatialAnchors. In addition, SpatialEntities can be shared across devices/users.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.NodeId
member.summary: Unique id that identifies this QR code for this session.

member.summary: Version of this QR code.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.PhysicalSideLength
member.summary: Physical width or height of this QR code in Meters.

member.summary: QR code Data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.RawData
member.summary: QR code CodeRawData this is the error corrected raw data bytes. Used when the platform is unable to decode the encoding and user can decode as needed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.MixedReality.QR.QRCode.SystemRelativeLastDetectedTime
member.summary: QR code last detected QPC ticks.
